tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE quality_metrics (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  admission_date DATE,
  discharge_date DATE,
  readmission_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Hospital (
    hospital_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hospital_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    bed_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE Patient (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    admission_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Readmission (
    readmission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    hospital_id INT,
    readmission_date DATE,
    reason VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    readmission_id INT,
    metric_type VARCHAR(50),
    value INT
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    age INT NOT NULL,
    hospital_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (hospital_id) REFERENCES Hospitals(hospital_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Admissions (
    admission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    admission_date DATE NOT NULL,
    discharge_date DATE NOT NULL,
    patient_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ReadmissionRates (
    readmission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    readmission_date DATE NOT NULL,
    readmission_reason VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    patient_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  dob DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  admission_date DATE,
  discharge_date DATE,
  hospital_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (hospital_id) REFERENCES Hospitals(hospital_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Admissions (
  admission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  admission_date DATE,
  discharge_date DATE,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
  treatment VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Readmissions (
  readmission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  admission_id INT,
  readmission_date DATE,
  cause VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (admission_id) REFERENCES Admissions(admission_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Metrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hospital_id INT,
  readmission_rate FLOAT,
  quality_rating VARCHAR(10),
  FOREIGN KEY (hospital_id) REFERENCES Hospitals(hospital_id)
);
